metadata.title: CVE-2016-4567 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in flash/FlashMediaElement.as inMediaElement.js before 2.21.0, as used in WordPress before 4.5.2, allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an obfuscatedform of the jsinitfunction parameter, as demonstrated by"jsinitfunctio%gn."

criterions.comment: mediaelement package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
